ygData.subject: Re: Grouping levels
ygData.msgSnippet: In MM we brought a level 18 Druid friend into our party.  The highest level player was a 27 Magi.  She claimed to have gotten exp and good exp at that, when we
ygData.messageBody:
In MM we brought a level 18 Druid friend into our party. The highest level
player was a 27 Magi. She claimed to have gotten exp and good exp at that,
when we thought she wouldn't. This is contrary to what I've heard that at
level 20 you are first able to get exp with players 10 levels above you.
Maybe at 18 it's 9.... I really think this is something that Verant should
define for us.



>I am a level 18 bard on the Rathe. Some friends of mine are going to go to
>Runneye in the warlords room tomorrow. The highest is a level 27 Shaman. I
>know I won't be much use as for damage but I can add buffing and healing to
>the mix easily. But can I group with them and get xp?
>Thanks
>Ranian
>18th Song
